title: Android app deals of the day: Botanicula, Samorost 2 and 3, Pocket Academy, more
content:
Today’s Android app deals are now up for the taking and featuring some wonderful adventure titles as well as popular sims and more. Just make sure you don’t miss out on today’s Gold Box Samsung handset sale at up to $400 off and this deal on its Galaxy Buds 2 as well. Our app collection is headlined by titles like Botanicula, Samorost 2 and 3, Pocket Academy, MechaNika, Color Wheel, and much more. Browse through all of today’s best Android app deals below the fold.
